Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/66th
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are rerouted via Ashland, 67th, Racine, 63rd, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/66th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 67th, Racine, 63rd, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/66th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
